arts.ttl: Milan 1 – Roma 0 | Pavlovic: “Happy for my goal and victory”
arts.sum: Strahinja Pavlovic, who scored the decisive goal tonight, spoke to DAZN after Milan-Roma. Here are his statements: What feeling does this match leave you with? “I’m very happy for this goal and the victory. I’m also very happy because I’m going to be a father. I’m very tired to speak Italian, sorry (laughs).” Pavlovic, with […]

arts.ttl: Milan 1 – Roma 0 | Allegri: “We were under heavy pressure”
arts.sum: Massimiliano Allegri spoke to DAZN after Milan’s 1-0 win against Roma. Here’s what he said: After taking the lead, you could have finished the game, but there was also good solidity. Now even Rafa Leao shows the same sense of sacrifice that the team has. Today the team played like a real team: “For the […]

arts.ttl: Milan 1 – Roma 0 | Leao: “Proud of the win”
arts.sum: Rafael Leao spoke to DAZN after Milan’s 1-0 win against Roma. Here are his full statements. On the match: "I work for the team. These kinds of games are very tough. It’s not about one player’s talent, you must never give up. They didn’t score earlier and didn’t score from the penalty either, which was […]

arts.ttl: Milan 1 – Roma 0 | Maignan: “I’m happy with what I gave to the team”
arts.sum: Mike Maignan spoke to DAZN after Milan’s 1-0 win against Roma. Here are his statements: What does this victory mean? "It’s three important points, like every point we need to fight for. Since the start of the season, we’ve been trying to battle for every second on the pitch. When we play together like this, […]

arts.ttl: Maignan praises ‘compact, united’ Milan after Roma win but insists it is ‘too early to dream’
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Mike Maignan believes that it is ‘too early’ for AC Milan to dream too much, but insists that they are on the right path. Milan ground out a very important win against Roma at San Siro on Sunday night, with Maignan part of a heroic rearguard effort. The only goal came from that defensive line […] The post Maignan praises ‘compact, united’ Milan after Roma win but insists it is ‘too early to dream’ appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Player Ratings: AC Milan 1-0 Roma – Maignan, Pavlovic and Leao brilliance
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller AC Milan clinched all three points against Roma after a strong response to the away side’s initial dominance. Three players stood out, even if many did well, and below are the ratings for the Rossoneri. If you haven’t already, make sure to check out how we decide the player ratings. arts.ttl: AC Milan beat Roma 1-0: Pavlovic scores and Maignan saves the day
arts.sum: AC Milan defeated AS Roma 1-0 in the big match of Serie A’s tenth round. Pavlovic’s goal decided it. The Rossoneri wasted at least two clear chances to double the lead and then thanked Maignan for saving Dybala’s penalty in the final minutes.
